item.description:
This is a 90 minute endurance race on the joint track at F1 Boston. Teams of 2 to 3 drivers can be formed. I've created this meetup with a 3 driver configuration. Anyone interested in a 2 driver configuration - please let me know, and I'll try to create a team for you.

Schedule Of Events
6:00 PM Driver Arrival, Check-In & Weigh-In
6:30 PM Drivers Meeting and Full Safety Briefing
7:30 PM Qualifying Session
8:15 PM Official Race Start
9:45 PM Official End of Race

A minimum of 5 pit stops are required during the race.

All race gear is provided by F1 Boston.

Please answer all of the questions in the RSVP. They are required for the entry form.

When you have RSVP'd, a check for $100 is due. I will send you the address to mail it to. They will be cashed only when the entry form is being submitted.

If for any reason you are unable to make it to the event after payment has been made to F1 Boston, then it is your responsibility to negotiate with F1 Boston for a refund, or you can arrange for someone else to step in for you.
item.name: 90 minute Endurance - Team G-Force RMG
